mapper.select: select count(*) from PUCHING p,MESSAGE m where m.message_no=p.message_no and m.message_content_type='puching' and (p.puching_status='신청' or p.puching_status='수락') and ((m.message_sender=#{senderNo} and m.message_receiver=#{receiverNo}) or (m.message_sender=#{receiverNo} and m.message_receiver=#{senderNo})) and rownum=1
mapper.update: update PUCHING set PUCHING_STATUS=#{puchingStatus} WHERE MESSAGE_NO=#{messageNo}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM PUCHING p,PUCHING_REVIEW pr WHERE p.PUCHING_NO=pr.PUCHING_NO and p.MESSAGE_NO=#{messageNo} and pr.PUCHING_REVIEW_WRITER=#{senderNo}
SELECT PUCHING_STATUS FROM PUCHING WHERE MESSAGE_NO=#{messageNo}

SELECT PUCHING_NO FROM PUCHING WHERE MESSAGE_NO= (SELECT MESSAGE_NO FROM MESSAGE WHERE ((MESSAGE_SENDER=#{senderNo} and MESSAGE_RECEIVER=#{receiverNo}) or (MESSAGE_SENDER=#{receiverNo} and MESSAGE_RECEIVER=#{senderNo})) and MESSAGE_CONTENT_TYPE='puching') and PUCHING_STATUS='수락'
